modName: Complete xpadder control_control de xpadder completo
summary: xpadder config with 20 hotkeys! 1 to 8, F1 to f4, c v b n g h y and [.
descriptionHtml:
simply see the pic, this xpadder config give you 15 hotkeys 8 normal 4 for groups from SKyUI and other 3 for independent mods.
if you find any trouble or any solution, please coment and share.

sometimes the controller lose the original order, specifically when you hold first LB, hold RS and you stop pressing LB holding RS, then the config for RS group come up to first config, simply open character menu.

I recommend use SKyUI to change groups, "enhanced 3rd person camera" to change the shoulder camera and change camera position (this can break your aim with bow, use "proper aiming" to solve it, "equipping overhaul to lit torches" , "TKdodge" and "VioLens" to feel intense combat.


simplemente mira las imagenes, esta configuracion te permite llevar 15 accesos directos, los 8 normales, 4 para los grupos del SKyUI y 3 mas independientes para otros mods.
si encuentras algun problema o alguna solucion algun problema que pueda haber, por favor comentamelo.

a veces el mando pierde el orden original concretamente cuando mantienes pulsado LB, despues mantienes RS, y sueltas LB manteniendo RS, la botonera del grupo de RS queda como la primera. simplemente abre el menu de personaje y volvera a la original.

recomiendo usar SKyUI para cambiar rapido de grupos, "enhanced 3rd person camera" para cambiar el punto de la camara y el hombro desde el que se ve (esto estropeara tu punteria con el arco pero usando "proper aiming" se soluciona), "equipping overhaul" para dejar caer antorchas, "TKdodge" y "VioLens" para tener unos combates mas intensos.



Lstick = WASD
Rstick = mouse
LS = sneak-sigilo
RS = POv-primera persona
A = enter/action/active
B = character menu
X = sheathe-preparar arma
Y = jump-salto
LB = run-correr
RB = shout-grito
LT = left hand-mano izda
RT = right hand-mano derecha
start = journal-misiones
back = favorite-favoritos
D left = Hotkey 1
D down = Hotkey 2
D right = Hotkey 3
D up = Hotkey 4

LB+X = F1
LB+A = F2
LB+B = F3
LB+Y = F6
LB+D left = Hotkey 5
LB+D down = Hotkey 6
LB+D Right = Hotkey 7
LB+D up = Hotkey 8
LB+start = options (esc)
LB+back = time-esperar

RS+LB = zoom in
RS+RB = zoom out
RS+A = g
RS+X = h
RS+y = y
RS+D left = c
RS+D down = v
RS+D Right = b
RS+D up = n
RS+start = quickload
RS+back = quicksave

"c, v, b, n, g, h, y and [" are to put your shortcut depending your mods
in my case are "SKyUI" groups 7, 8, and 9. "equipping overhaul" on/off
"equipping overhaul" drop lit torche, "campfire" use instinct.

"c, v, b, n, g, h, y y [" son para poner el acceso directo al mod que quieras
en mi caso son para "SKyUI" grupos 7, 8, y 9. equipping overhaul" on/off
"equipping overhaul" tirar antorchas, "campfire" usar instinto.

I repeat. please try new combos, if you find a trouble, or an improvement, share.
y repito. por favor provar conbinaciones nuevas, si encontrais un error o conoceis alguna mejora, compartid
